QuestionTypes.Type: Name the game from a bad description

QuestionList.QuestionTxt: What type(s) does Johto Wooper have?
In which geneneration was Dusknoir introduced?
Name all of the Sinnoh starters.
Name at least 5 Eevee evolutions
QuestionList.Answer: All evolutions: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Leafeon, Umbreon, Sylveon, Espeon, Glaceon

QuestionList.QuestionTxt: Name all possible Burmy evolution and the conditions to get them
QuestionList.Answer:
Male Burmy -> Mothim 
Female Burmy evolves into Wormadam with 3 different cloaks 
Plant Cloak: Last battle in the overworld
Sandy Cloak: Last Battle was in cave or a beach
Trash Cloak: Last battle was in building

QuestionList.QuestionTxt: What was 'Mario' originally know as in 'Donkey Kong'
From which country is the original developer of Minecraft
What is the full name of 'DotA'
What is the agent number given to the main character in 'Hitman'?
Name at least 8 of the available characters in 'Super Smash Bros' on N64?
QuestionList.Answer: Captain Falcon, Donkey Kong, Fox, Jigglypuff, Kirby, Link, Luigi, Mario, Ness, Pikachu, Samus, Yoshi

QuestionList.QuestionTxt: In The Matrix, what color are the two pills that Morpheus gives Neo to choose between?
What was 'Scream' originally called?
Phil, Stu, and Alan spend all of The Hangover looking for their friend Doug. Where do they eventually find him?
In what movie did Keanu Reeves make his TV debut in 1986?
What is Lightning McQueen's number in Cars?
What is a group of crows called.
What is a female fox called?
What male sea creature gives birth to its young?,
What are the only two mammals that lay eggs?
What animal squirts blood from its eyes as a defensive mechanism?
Pink puffball fight a greedy hammer-wielding penguin by eating his enemies and absorbing their powers. He tends to make things worse by accident.
Nerd with thick glasses tries to solve his problems with a crowbar
A redneck and a snarky girl team up to crush an old woman under a boulder and do jigsaw puzzles. Redneck's sister narrowly escapes transformation into an ogre.
Pirates try to conquer the universe using jellyfish, and the only one who can stop them is an orphaned girl raised by birds.
A strapping young man dresses in leather and enters an old family acquaintance's dungeon to whip him mercilessly.
